block.p: Melissa Maelynn Chun, the daughter of Mr. and Mrs. Allan W. T. Chun of Honolulu, was married there yesterday to John Christopher Vecsey, the son of Mrs. Richard Sutro Rothschild of White Plains and the late Armand J. Vecsey. The Rev. Wallace Kuroiwa performed the Congregational ceremony at the Nuuani Church.
The bride, 31, is a sales representative for the Emigrant Mortgage Company in New York. She graduated from Pacific University.

Melissa Maelynn Chun, the daughter of Mr. and Mrs. Allan W. T. Chun of Honolulu, was married there yesterday to John Christopher Vecsey, the son of Mrs. Richard Sutro Rothschild of White Plains and the late Armand J. Vecsey. The Rev. Wallace Kuroiwa performed the Congregational ceremony at the Nuuani Church.
The bride, 31, is a sales representative for the Emigrant Mortgage Company in New York. She graduated from Pacific University.
The bridegroom, 34, is a corporate account manager for the Cellular One telephone company in New York. He graduated from the University of Alaska. WEDDINGS
